Ok, my mind isn't working right now. So when you read this, get what I'm trying to say, not what's actually typed.

::Shredder::

Hovering a bit aways from the Iron Fist, far enough to have ample warning if he was suddenly under fire, Shredder recieves Galvatron's transmission. He frowns. Didn't the bot have any patience?

"I'm outside of the Iron Fist currently," Shredder replies in a normal tone, "I've contacted Halucigen but he hasn't replied yet. He is in there, though."

Ending that transmission, Shredder attempts to open a link to Halucigen again.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
>  He said his thanks and loved the sight of this energon. he took a sip and 
> watched as she studied the ship. He had made sure to lock out some specific 
> files fromm all but him. For he was still unsure how long this little one 
> would be with them. he stood up and sent a comm out to Shredder. "Shredder 
> report. You have been gone all morning whats your position."
